alert.note: Alert for South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 13 at 9:59AM AKST until November 14 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snowfall accumulations of 3 to 6 inches through tonight. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range, Upper Kobuk Valleys, Lower Koyukuk Valley, Middle Yukon Valley and Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes of the Western Brooks Range; Upper Kobuk Valleys
